mapper.select: select * from mvcboard6 order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into mvcboard6 (bname, bpass, btitle, bcontent, bip, bfile) values (#{bname},#{bpass},#{btitle},#{bcontent},#{bip},#{bfile})
mapper.update: update mvcboard6 set bhit = bhit+1 where bno=#{bno}
update mvcboard6 set btitle = #{btitle}, bcontent = #{bcontent}, bfile = #{bfile} where bno = #{bno} and bpass = #{bpass};
mapper.delete: delete from mvcboard6 where bno = #{bno} and bpass=#{bpass};
